name: Spunky: Festival Freaks (Early Build)
description:
You're a little ball, and want to get to a City festival in time, but an abnormal amount of monsters have started to roam the area, But mere monsters don't scare you! (Any donations would be acceptable ^^)

--Tips--

-This Game Will Be Seeing Updates In The Future, Stay Tuned!

-If the arrow keys do not work click the screen!

-After Spunky lands, wait for a second, as Spunky will temporarily lose his walking animation for some reason. 

-be aware this is a prototype and bugs will most definitely occur

-Almost all of the games assets are borrowed from other people, and are subject to change in the future. this being the tilesets, background, the spikes, arrows, and music.
